class.name: Accordion
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around the jQuery UI accordion widget

constructor.param: style data to pass to the Accordion

class.property: The id of the div holding the accordion
The count of the number of items in the accordion

event.name: onChange

param.name: seen
param.description: array containing the viewed state of all items

event.description: Fires when the item index has been changed

event.name: onComplete
event.description: Fires when all items have been viewed

method.name: getCompleted
method.return: True/False has the user seen all items
